1dcfee77-6819-4e02-b0f0-d4755051c077.name: VMs Remaining VM Profile (40 GB Disk and Average Demand per VM)

ddb057b2-9704-4dcb-a9f0-91e32d814c56.name: VMs Remaining VM Profile (2 vCPU and Average Demand per VM)

9c2e72ce-8695-4bd2-908b-c75b1db9e021.name: VMs Remaining VM Profile (2 vCPU, 4 GB RAM, 40 GB Disk and Average Demand per VM)
9c2e72ce-8695-4bd2-908b-c75b1db9e021.formula: floor( min( [ ${this, metric=OnlineCapacityAnalytics|cpu|demand|capacityRemaining} / ( 2 * ( ${this, metric=cpu|demandmhz} / ${this, metric=summary|number_running_vcpus} ) ), ${this, metric=OnlineCapacityAnalytics|mem|demand|capacityRemaining} / ( 4 * 1024 * 1024 * ( ${this, metric=mem|total_need} / ${this, metric=mem|memory_allocated_on_all_vms} ) ), ${this, metric=OnlineCapacityAnalytics|diskspace|demand|capacityRemaining} / ( 40 * ( ${this, metric=diskspace|used} / ${this, metric=diskspace|total_provisioned} ) ) ] ) )

5d643eb4-f2a0-4d7d-bbc1-be8305e753e0.name: VMs Remaining VM Profile (4 GB RAM and Average Demand per VM)
